title: Firefox ukládá otevřené soubory
content: Při otevírání souboru v e-mailu např. v PDF se tento soubor, i když ho otevírám v režimu náhledu, automaticky uloží. Prosím o radu, jak zamezit ukládání podobných souborů.
creator: david590

title: Firefox not saving history or bookmarks
content:
Firefox is not saving any history or bookmarks. Version 99.0 (64-bit)

Settings are correctly set to remember history. Refreshed and troubleshoot run multiple times

Verify integrity setting of Places Database in about:support gives the following error message: > Task: checkIntegrity - Unable to fix corruption, places.sqlite will be replaced on next startup > Task: invalidateCaches - The task queue was cleared by an error in another task. > Task: checkCoherence - The task queue was cleared by an error in another task. > Task: expire - The task queue was cleared by an error in another task. > Task: originFrecencyStats - The task queue was cleared by an error in another task. > Task: vacuum - The task queue was cleared by an error in another task. > Task: stats - The task queue was cleared by an error in another task.


Any ideas/fixes?
creator: danvyas08

title: Firefox will not Let me drag and drop attachments into my emails anymore
content: Hi all, after an update Firefox will not let me drag and drop attachments into my emails anymore (I have to manually go through the attach option). I use Microsoft outlook and am on Windows 10. I tried using troubleshoot mode to see if it was an add-on but the problem persisted. Does anyone have any advice? Thank you!
creator: m_montalto

title: Save Link as behavior for blocked files by proxy
content:
I am browsing the a proxy solution that is configured to block malicious files. I was testing the eicar file download through https://www.eicar.org/?page_id=3950. When I click on the download, my download is blocked and nothing happens (which is expected). However, if I right-click on the file and select "Save Link as" option, I get the block message, I get the pop-up window to save the file, and Firefox creates a file in the specified location. However, the file is invalid (obviously as the download was blocked). If I try the same with another Browser (like Chrome), it gives an error "Failed - Forbidden" for the download.

Trying to understand how Firefox handles such instances, does it first create a file in the specified location, even the file is not retrieved through the proxy? Why is firefox not giving an error message similar to other browsers if it actually fails to download the file.
creator: mtnetskope2

title: How do I disable add-on onboard/upboard/offboard popups?
content: I don't want popups when installing, upgrading, or uninstalling add-ons. How do I prevent all of them?
creator: PAGulley

title: Passwords don't work and Sync locking up
content:
I put a favorite on my wife's FF (v99 on latest Windows 10 Pro). This https site should have asked to save the password - it did not. When I went to Settings > Privacy & Security then click on [Saved Logins] I get a SYNC page that tells me I have to have a SYNC account. There were no logins found, which is scary because she has 50 (or so) logins to various sites she goes to. Clicking the [Create New Login] and entering the data then clicking [Save] freezes (fuzzes out the page) and does nothing.

This Password problem with Firefox is getting frustrating enough to quit using the product. One of the primary functions of a browser is to save our passwords. I do not want to use SYNC and have no interest in using it. It is atrocious to lose my 200 (or so) passwords every month for the last three months and now my wife's 50 (or so) passwords. This FF password manager is out of control and SYNC is another technological abomination.

What in the world is wrong with Firefox. We've never had these problems for over 15 years until the end of last year and so far this year?

Her profile (and mine) reside on a NAS drive with a "hard link" from our PCs to this network location.
creator: BPaul_H

title: group speeddial app broke with 99 update
content: windows 10. firefox version 99 changed my group speed dial app on my pc. the boxes are still there but no thumbnails. my grid is 72 boxes 12x6. it doesn't do any good to reload the thumbnail.

title: Crashing
content:
Hello: I found on a help page the info for submitting crash reports, but tonight's crash wasn't listed as a crash. I was just browsing and my screen went blank. When it returned, my tabs came back but they all have to be reset. e.g., I have to log back in to by Twitter, Facebook, and all other password protected accounts. This happens frequently and it is very annoying. I'm reporting this hoping that the problem can be fixed.

Sincerely,
creator: metaphysicial

title: Update removed my settings and addons because of "Old" profile
content:
Hello! Since the most recent firefox update, my settings and extensions have been inaccessible to me due to my firefox account profile being "old." It has been working perfectly until this update. If I try to change my profile to my old one, it forces me to create a new one which does not include my saved addons and settings. I am able to usually manually move my bookmarks to the new profile via the files stored locally. I really need access to the settings and extensions, so it would be great if someone can help me to recover them. I tried to troubleshoot by finding my extensions local folder from my old profile, and I copied it to a new profile, but it didn't work. I am also wondering, if I do copy the extensions successfully, how can I also copy the settings preferences? Any solution is appreciated, thank you!

I tried this: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/recover-user-data-missing-after-firefox-update And I tried this https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/profiles-where-firefox-stores-user-data#w_what-information-is-stored-in-my-profile
creator: 36532student

title: Firefox tabs are not friendly to the visually impaired, is there a solution?
content: I have been helping a family member who has some health and visual difficulties, using firefox desktop for Mac. I am realizing how very difficult it is to navigate the tabs for this person; actually the whole top of the page takes her a lot of work to find what she needs. Tabs, icons, the bookmarks toolbars, these are all just a bunch of tiny text & icons that have no visual cues to differentiate what is what. It is even hard to tell which tab you are on, the color difference is so slight. I tried searching for themes that would perhaps make a difference but all they do is change the background color. Is there anything I can change that will make firefox more usable for this person?
creator: DB-1

title: Slow start of vr 99
content: On Windows 7, vr 98 was starting in a second. Now vr 99 start in 9 second. On Windows 10, vr 99 start in a second. Will it be fix soon or how can I reinstall vr 98 AND keep my profile?
